column3: 陸地面積(1)(2) （平方公里） Land Area(1)(2) (sq. km)
column4: 年中人口(1)(3) （千人） Mid- year Population(1)(3) ('000)
column5: 人口密度(1)(2) （每平方公里人數） Population Density(1)(2) (Persons per sq. km)

column1: (1) 計算人口密度時，並不包括水上人口及水塘面積。本表所列的陸地面積是用作計算人口密度的面積 （採用2015年區議會分區分界），由於涵蓋範圍（例如不包括水塘）的分別，數字可能與其他刊物公報的稍有不同。此外，由於四捨五入關係，個別陸地面積的數字加起來可能與總數略有出入。 (1) Marine population and area for reservoirs are not included in calculating population density.  Land area figures shown in this table refer to those adopted for calculating population density (based on 2015 District Council boundaries) and may differ slightly from those published in other publications due to the difference in coverage (e.g. exclusion of reservoirs).  Besides, there may be a slight discrepancy between the sum of individual figures of land area and the total owing to rounding.

(2) 不包括落馬洲河套區整幅面積0.97平方公里之土地。雖然該幅土地已納入香港特別行政區之範圍內，但屬於那區議會地區則未有決定。 (2) Excluding a land area of 0.97km2 for Lok Ma Chau Loop which has been included into the boundary of Hong Kong SAR but which District Council it will be included into is pending.
(3) 數字已經修訂，該修訂是以2016年中期人口統計的結果作為基準來編制。 (3) Figures of have been revised to take into account the results of the 2016 Population By-census which provided a benchmark for revising the population.
